title: Tail

params.defense: None agains town. Strong against non town.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
At night, lead someone amongs their path, marking them. This is not a visit.
At day, pick up to 3 people, of which are marked.
Those people will gain a private chat with you.
Anyone within the group will be told they may chose to kill someone else.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You will be told the target of anyone's attack if they are marked. You may secretly redirect one of them.
Anyone within the group targeting you with their attack will immediately perish. Ending the group.
